description:
The GX line takes popular athletic frames and adds a foam gasket to block wind and debris. The lenses are coated inside to resist fogging and the outside is coated to shed water and wipe clean easily.

  • Frame fits large faces best
  • Nose and temple pads keep them in place
  • Open-cell foam gasket blocks wind and debris
  • Lenses have anti-fog and rain shedding coatings
  • Photochromic orange lens has 47-15% visible light transmission
  • Photochromic Yellow lens has 76-27% visible light transmission
name: Ryders Eyewear Face GX Sunglasses - Unisex
